quote.summary: WLS Holdings Ltd is an investment holding company principally engaged in the provision of scaffolding, fitting out and other auxiliary services for construction and buildings work. The Company operates its business through four segments. The Scaffolding, Fitting Out and Other Auxiliary Services for Construction and Buildings Work segment is mainly engaged in the provision of scaffolding services, fitting out services and other auxiliary services for construction and buildings work. The Segment also provides fitting out services and ceiling work to commercial institutions and luxury residence end-users. In addition, the Segment provides gondolas, parapet railings and access equipment installation and maintenance services. The Money Lending Business segment mainly provides short-term and long-term loans services. The Securities Investment Business segment engages in investing in Hong Kong-listed securities. The Assets Management Business segment provides assets management services.
